b3ch1.title: No regrets
b3ch1.caption: He who risks nothing can gain nothing.

b3ch1.title: Password acquired
b3ch1.caption: You never know when a secret code might come in handy.

b3ch2.title: Metal golem slayer
b3ch2.caption: Kill a large metal golem with your own hands.

b3ch2.title: Time to get serious
b3ch2.caption: Sometimes, you just need to pull out all the stops.

b3ch2.title: I cannot tell a lie.
b3ch2.caption: Honest Barry is what they call you.

b3ch2.title: Reckless
b3ch2.caption: Live up to your new nickname.

b3ch3.title: Ominous foreshadowing
b3ch3.caption: Were you perhaps expecting something less vague?

b3ch3.title: An unexpected bonus
b3ch3.caption: Not all mistakes lead to misfortune.

b3ch3.title: A job well done!
b3ch3.caption: Congratulations! You managed to find the only death scene in this chapter. (You were doing it on purpose, right?)

b3ch3.title: An unforeseen premonition
b3ch3.caption: Hint: Your stat device will not help you here.

b3ch4.title: Fourth wall demolisher
b3ch4.caption: Did you ever break the 4th wall so hard that you felt you could almost see through the cracks?

b3ch4.title: A hidden alliance
b3ch4.caption: Form a secret alliance with a potential new king of Ollendor.

b3ch4.title: A master of deception
b3ch4.caption: Your quick wit and improvisation skills are second to none. Nobody is better at lying than you.

b3ch4.title: Rock throwing champion
b3ch4.caption: Defeat a very powerful adversary using only a rock taken from the ground.

b3ch5.title: Opportunist
b3ch5.caption: Why give away anything for free when you can make a small profit instead?

b3ch5.title: The good old days
b3ch5.caption: Reenact one of the night shifts from the first days of the tournament.

b3ch5.title: I can hear footsteps.
b3ch5.caption: Listen carefully. The assassin is getting nearer.

b3ch5.title: Challenge accepted
b3ch5.caption: Take on a challenge that not many mortals would dare to attempt.

b3ch61.title: A natural liar
b3ch61.caption: Lie so well that you make someone question their own short-term memory.

b3ch61.title: Nice assist
b3ch61.caption: Get help from someone that you've fought against in the past.

b3ch61.title: Peek-a-boo!
b3ch61.caption: Win a very complex game of hide and seek.

b3ch61.title: An assassin's credo
b3ch61.caption: Find out what it means to be a true assassin from a skilled practitioner of the craft.

b3ch61.title: Guardian angel
b3ch61.caption: Prevent someone from dying after seeing their death in a vision.

b3ch62.title: Time freeze enthusiast
b3ch62.caption: Experience the world being frozen around you two times in the same day.

b3ch62.title: Curiosity killed the cat
b3ch62.caption: Be honest. Did you really fall for the trap, or were you just aiming to get this achievement?

b3ch62.title: Average is my middle name
b3ch62.caption: Survive the trip to the surface without having any points invested in your stats.

b3ch62.title: Quarantine ender
b3ch62.caption: Help Daren save everyone from the quarantine area in the underground tunnels below Ollendor.

b3ch62.title: Do you hear an echo?
b3ch62.caption: Listen to a conversation that is happening at the opposite end of a long underground tunnel.

b3ch7.title: An honorable victory
b3ch7.caption: Defeat Gontrok without taking advantage of his bet with Leila.

b3ch7.title: Sharpshooter
b3ch7.caption: An achievement awarded only to those with unmatched crossbow skills.

b3ch7.title: Paranoid
b3ch7.caption: The whole world is out to get you. You can't trust anyone. Not even yourself.

b3ch8.title: Master of bluffing
b3ch8.caption: Successfully bluff a living lie detector.

b3ch8.title: An unusual candidate
b3ch8.caption: Convince Kelrim to become a candidate for the throne of Ollendor.

b3ch8.title: A heartfelt promise
b3ch8.caption: Make a promise with Leila that you will go on adventures together after the end of the tournament.

b3ch8.title: A friend in need
b3ch8.caption: Help cheer up a friend when he is feeling down.

b3ch9.title: Consolation prize
b3ch9.caption: A prize awarded for dying more than five times in the same chapter.

b3ch9.title: An introspective moment
b3ch9.caption: Take a moment to self-reflect and think about everything that you've achieved.

b3ch9.title: High-value targets
b3ch9.caption: Defeat Albert, Peter and the king of the underground without asking the Overseer for help.

b3ch9.title: No need for trinkets
b3ch9.caption: Defeat the Overseer without making any use of your stat device.

b3ch10.title: Friends with benefits
b3ch10.caption: Agree to enter a relationship with no strings attached with Melindra after the tournament.

b3ch10.title: Third piece of the puzzle
b3ch10.caption: Find the third piece of the puzzle made by Varathia's greatest architect.

b3ch10.title: No man left behind
b3ch10.caption: Receive confirmation that every prisoner in the seredium towers has been rescued, including Alice's father.

b3ch10.title: Let's be reasonable!
b3ch10.caption: Defuse a hostage situation by remaining calm and collected.

b3ch10.title: Forbidden knowledge
b3ch10.caption: Find out the true nature of the Magium.

b3ch11.title: Fourth piece of the puzzle
b3ch11.caption: Find the fourth piece of the puzzle made by Varathia's greatest architect.

b3ch11.title: A small taste of the big prize
b3ch11.caption: Use knowledge from the Magium to improve a spell.

b3ch11.title: Hidden alliance aftermath
b3ch11.caption: Receive direct confirmation from the Overseer that his plan to free the mage slaves is going smoothly.

b3ch12.title: Preparing for the big battle
b3ch12.caption: Start working on the most important spell to be used against the God of Time.

b3ch12.title: Serial liar
b3ch12.caption: Successfully bluff two people in the same chapter and manage to survive.

b3ch12.title: One Dagger Man
b3ch12.caption: Survive against a powerful foe, armed with only one dagger.

b3ch12.title: Delegator
b3ch12.caption: Why fight for yourself when you can just have somebody else do it for you?

b3ch12.title: (more than) Average Joe
b3ch12.caption: Reach the end of the third book without leveling up any stats except your magical stats.
